name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, a multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurred on Jiannan Road in Chengdu, Sichuan. A van carrying cargo broke through the front vehicle's glass due to inertia, and the passenger in the front passenger seat was in doubt about his life or death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10, Dalian, Liaoning. Blogger "Football Fan Uncle Wang" was holding a national flag with "Serve the Country with Loyalty" written on his upper body. He was stopped by the police and was not allowed to enter the stadium to watch the game, and the two sides pushed each other.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, the Ministry of Finance reissued the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation for July, but it has not yet released the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation for June. At the same time, the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation for the first half of 2024 was released.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A document released by the Zhenjiang Lawyers Association on September 9 showed that the Zhenjiang Runzhou District Political and Legal Committee asked the Lawyers Association to inform that a lawyer surnamed Yu refused to accept the mediation arranged by the District Conflict Mediation Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, the Chinese national football team was reversed by the Saudi team in the second round of the World Cup qualifiers. The People's Daily published an article saying: The Chinese national football team did not show the advantage in numbers, and the head coach is to blame. Someone should stand up and take responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, Zhejiang Propaganda published an article about the Chinese national football team’s “Five Questions” that triggered deep thought. Question 1: The country is obviously prosperous, so why can’t it handle a ball? Question 2: The national system has achieved remarkable results, so why do we still insist on using the league mechanism? Question 3: The young people are obviously excellent, so why can’t the adults play like them? Question 4: Other sports can break records, so why is football always weak? Question 5: We are obviously disappointed with our country, so why do we still pay so much attention to football?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Putin expressed at the plenary session of the Eastern Economic Forum that he hopes China and other countries can mediate the conflict between Russia and Ukraine. On September 10, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded: China has always been committed to promoting peace and dialogue and supports all efforts conducive to peace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, blogger "Yiyan LuLu" posted a video saying that he was invited to attend the welcome dinner of the President of Tanzania. The luxurious courtyard, luxury cars and swimming pool in the video attracted attention. As of now, the videos on the blogger's homepages on multiple platforms are no longer visible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some schools announced that “Youth Great Learning” would no longer be used as an evaluation indicator, and some local Communist Youth League official accounts also removed the “Youth Great Learning” entrance. The reason is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, a writer wrote an article commenting on Mao Zedong's work "沁园春·雪" saying, "I wouldn't say it's very bad, but it's definitely inferior in the poetry circles of the two Song dynasties." This sparked public outrage, and many netizens @ the Ministry of National Security in the comment area. As of now, the article has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, a stabbing incident occurred on Pingjiang Road in Suzhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Zhanjiang, Guangdong. On the first day of school at Leizhou Tangbei Primary School, several students were beaten by the vice principal for doing the wrong homework. The video showed that many children had bruises on their legs. Leizhou Education Bureau: We heard about this incident and went to investigate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10, Qinghai. The woman said that her husband Ma Zhengjun was the former deputy director of the Qinghai Provincial Poverty Alleviation Bureau. She reported the Qinghai Supervisory Commission case officers Zhang Biao and Ma Chao under her real name. The two smeared Ma Zhengjun as an embezzler and provoked him to confess. They also fabricated Ma Zhengjun's crime of embezzling more than 10 million yuan. The case officer once said that "a department-level cadre must have 10 million illegal incomes." The woman said that her husband did not have any illegal income.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11 report, Beijing. "My son was bullied by a classmate on campus, and the father intercepted the classmate and verbally threatened him for 20 minutes, causing him to suffer psychological trauma and be detained for 10 days" triggered a lot of ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens interpret the draft of delaying retirement age

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 9, the Rail Transit Branch of the Kunming Public Security Bureau issued a "Notice on the Risks of Team Stability Due to Wage Arrears for Metro Employees". The document stated that as of August 31, Yunnan Jingjian Rail Transit Investment and Construction Co., Ltd. owed a total of 200 million yuan to employees, posing a major risk of stability maintenance. 
The company was required to investigate the unstable factors and safety hazards that may be caused by wage arrears, and promptly control the signs of gathering on site to demand wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yesterday, on Teachers’ Day, a video went viral online: A parent accused the teacher in a group of teaching students, “Don’t believe what your parents say, it’s the Communist Party that feeds you.” The parent said that if the teacher teaches like this, will the children dare to listen to their parents in the future?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a blogger named "Asheng" was suspected of being disabled due to vaccination, with symptoms similar to ALS, and this is the only case in the country. Asheng said: "The problem occurred on the day of vaccination, and because it involves political issues, "the doctor cannot mention it in the medical records." The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese Public Security Minister Wang Xiaohong announced that 3,000 foreign police officers will be trained in the coming year, and police advisers and working groups will be sent to countries in need.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Foshan, Guangdong, it was revealed online that the Foshan Arrow Furniture Company required its employees to fold gold ingots and worship Buddha at work. The company had a four-day holiday for National Day and three days of make-up work, which meant that after the four-day holiday, the employees had to work eight consecutive days. The company did not have full attendance bonuses or year-end bonuses, and recruitment also depended on the employees' zodiac signs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 10, Farmers' Daily: The wallets of hundreds of millions of farmers are getting fatter.
Economic Daily: my country's economy continues to recover and improve.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, the photos released by the studio of Guli Nazha, a Chinese artist from Xinjiang, were boycotted by netizens because of the American and Israeli flags in the background. The studio then deleted the photos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, South Korea's KBS TV station released a "North Korean educational film" in which students were punished for watching Korean dramas. One of the close-up shots showed that one of the discs was "Swordsman: Invincible in the East".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10 (Released) Qingdao, Shandong. A man corrected the traffic police on the spot, "The people are the masters of the country, and civil servants are the servants of the people. In addition, the traffic police must salute before enforcing the law, otherwise the law enforcement is not standardized." The citizens watching the excitement around applauded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10 (Released) Jiashan County, Zhejiang. It was reported online that a new store had opened, but the urban management officers came to the store and punctured the balloons in the store. Official: The store was worried that the balloons would explode when they were removed, so the law enforcement officers helped to clean up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10 (Released) A Chinese tourist posted a video saying that Nepal's Durbar Square was built with Chinese aid. "Other countries charge 500 rupees for admission, but only the Chinese charge 1,000 rupees." The tourist asked, "Why is this?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, X blogger " rainbow7852 " shared a video of Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov's public speech on X. In the video, Lavrov emphasized that Russia never wants other people's land, but only hopes that the Russian people can be treated humanely. The blogger believes that this speech can be called the funniest lie this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Fuzhou, Jiangxi. Several law enforcement officers beat and kicked a man, during which a woman fell to the ground to protect the man, and crying was heard at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, a netizen revealed that the domestic large-scale comic exhibition Hangzhou CP30 suddenly notified before the opening that due to relevant policy reasons, elements related to the famous Japanese anime "Attack on Titan" were prohibited from appearing, and related areas and booths were cancelled, and even role-playing was not allowed to appear. However, the organizer did not explain what the policy was, and there was no news that other Japanese anime were affected.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 8, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A contractor said that he had previously mainly worked on Evergrande projects, but Evergrande went bankrupt, resulting in tens of millions of project funds not being received. "I sued Evergrande, but the court said it couldn't handle it. When the workers sued me, the court put me in jail first."
